Natural Diabetes Management with Herbal Support: Discover Diabadox, Diabaplus & Gurmar Tablets

Living with diabetes doesn’t mean surrendering to medications alone. Whether you’re dealing with Type 1, Type 2, gestational diabetes, or pre-diabetic conditions, natural alternatives rooted in Ayurveda and modern herbal science can offer remarkable support. Three such powerful supplements—Diabadox, Diabaplus, and Gurmar Tablets—combine traditional wisdom with clinical innovation to help manage blood sugar naturally and safely.

Diabadox: Advanced Blood Sugar & Immune Support with Stabilized Allicin

Diabadox Herbal Blood Sugar Support is a science-backed, plant-based supplement featuring 100% stabilized Allicin, a patented compound derived from garlic. Each 431mg capsule delivers the equivalent therapeutic benefit of 360 raw garlic cloves—without the odor or aftertaste.

 Key Benefits of Diabadox:

  • Stabilizes Blood Glucose & HbA1c
    Regulates sugar levels and supports long-term metabolic balance.
  • Boosts Immunity Naturally
    Fights infections and strengthens the body’s defenses year-round.
  • Safe for Daily Use
    100% vegetarian, with no harsh chemicals or synthetic additives.
  • Research-Backed Formulation
    Developed in collaboration with garlic expert Dr. Peter Josling.

Ideal For:

  • People with Type 1, Type 2, or gestational diabetes (GDM)
  • Pre-diabetics or those seeking metabolic balance
  • Adults looking to enhance both blood sugar control and immunity

Dosage:

  • 1 capsule daily for general wellness
  • 2 capsules daily if blood sugar < 8
  • 3 capsules daily if blood sugar > 8
    Do not exceed 4 capsules/day

Diabaplus Tablets: Ayurvedic Blend of 11 Herbs for Holistic Glucose Control

Diabaplus is a powerful Ayurvedic formula combining Gurmar, Jamun, Karela, Belpatra, and other herbs traditionally known for blood sugar regulation and pancreatic health. Crafted in GMP-certified facilities, it’s suitable for both adults and children (4+ years).

Key Benefits of Diabaplus:

  • Natural Blood Sugar Regulation
    Gurmar and Jamun help maintain healthy glucose levels.
  • Pancreatic Function Support
    Encourages insulin secretion and pancreatic wellness.
  • Enhanced Glucose Metabolism
    Belpatra and Guduchi improve insulin sensitivity and sugar utilization.
  • Safe for Long-Term Use
    100% herbal with no synthetic chemicals—gentle and effective.

 Dosage:

  • 1 tablet twice daily, preferably before meals
  • Do not exceed 6 tablets/day

Gurmar Tablets: The “Sugar Destroyer” for Cravings & Glucose Balance

Known in Ayurveda as the “Sugar Destroyer,” Gurmar (Gymnema Sylvestre) is a powerful herb that targets sugar absorption, insulin production, and even your sweet tooth. Our Gurmar Tablets are made with premium-quality extract and finely ground for maximum efficacy.

Key Benefits of Gurmar Tablets:

  • Balances Blood Sugar
    Reduces sugar absorption and boosts insulin function.
  • Improves Carbohydrate Metabolism
    Aids in sugar breakdown for stable energy levels.
  • Reduces Sugar Cravings
    Suppresses sweet taste sensations, helping control appetite.
  • Vegan & Gluten-Free
    100% natural and safe for daily use.

 Dosage:

  • 1 tablet twice daily, preferably before meals
  • Do not exceed 6 tablets/day

Why Combine These Supplements?

Each supplement plays a complementary role in supporting diabetes management:

  • Diabadox for clinical-grade blood sugar balance and immune defense
  • Diabaplus for holistic Ayurvedic glucose support and pancreatic health
  • Gurmar for appetite control and sugar craving reduction

Together, they create a powerful trio for anyone seeking a natural, well-rounded approach to diabetic health.

Final Thoughts

Managing diabetes naturally is not just a trend—it’s a lifestyle choice that empowers your body’s natural functions. With the support of Diabadox, Diabaplus, and Gurmar Tablets, you can take proactive control of your health in a gentle yet effective way.
